async_info.video_title: Typhoon Hagibis: Rescuers deployed in wake of deadly storm - BBC News
async_info.video_description:
Thousands of troops and rescue workers are battling flooding and landslides after the strongest typhoon to hit Japan in 60 years.
The storm has killed around two dozen people, with more still missing according to public broadcaster NHK.
In central Nagano prefecture, water surrounded Japan's famous bullet trains while helicopters plucked stranded residents from rooftops.
A total of 27,000 military troops and other rescue crews have been deployed in relief operations, authorities said.
Please subscribe HERE http://bit.ly/1rbfUog

TyphoonÂ HagibisÂ playedÂ havocÂ inÂ JapanÂ with Â Â hugeÂ damageÂ throughÂ rainÂ andÂ windsÂ inÂ TokyoÂ asÂ wellÂ onÂ 12Â andÂ aroundÂ inÂ OctoberÂ 2019.Â NearlyÂ aÂ millionÂ residentsÂ Â were Â Â askedÂ toÂ vacateÂ andÂ moveÂ toÂ saferÂ locationsÂ whileÂ overÂ Â fiveÂ dozensÂ areÂ saidÂ toÂ haveÂ died.Â Â Â TheÂ typhoonÂ HagibisÂ isÂ saidÂ toÂ beÂ worstÂ inÂ 60Â years ,Â followingÂ aÂ stormÂ thatÂ rattledÂ JapanÂ aÂ monthÂ pastÂ inÂ SeptemberÂ ,Â 2019.Â InÂ thisÂ contextÂ ,Â itÂ isÂ aptÂ toÂ referÂ readersÂ toÂ thisÂ VedicÂ astrologyÂ writerâ€™sÂ predictiveÂ alertÂ inÂ articleÂ -Â â€œÂ FreshÂ lookÂ andÂ innovationÂ atÂ strategiesÂ becomingÂ focusÂ forÂ JapanÂ inÂ comingÂ yearÂ 2019Â ,Â aÂ VedicÂ astrologyÂ viewâ€Â Â -Â broughtÂ toÂ publicÂ domainÂ widelyÂ lastÂ yearÂ 2018Â inÂ October-November.Â InÂ relationÂ toÂ September â€“OctoberÂ 2019Â ,Â theÂ textÂ ofÂ theÂ alertÂ inÂ theÂ saidÂ articleÂ ,Â readsÂ likeÂ thisÂ :-
â€œÂ MoreÂ careÂ mayÂ beÂ paidÂ duringÂ theseÂ monthsÂ whileÂ dealingÂ withÂ orÂ storingÂ orÂ handlingÂ fireÂ ,Â chemicalsÂ ,Â explosive ,Â nuclear-energyÂ ,Â hydro-powerÂ andÂ theÂ like.Â SomeÂ healthÂ hazardsÂ orÂ healthÂ concernsâ€¦â€¦â€¦â€¦..Â couldÂ manifestÂ duringÂ theÂ yearÂ ,Â moreÂ soÂ duringÂ theÂ aforesaidÂ months.Â OneÂ orÂ moreÂ ofÂ suchÂ regionsÂ asÂ Kitakyushu ,Â YonagoÂ ,Â KyotcoÂ ,Â Yokohama Â Â orÂ otherÂ vulnerableÂ regionsÂ inÂ Japan Â mayÂ keepÂ aÂ noteÂ forÂ takingÂ moreÂ careÂ andÂ appropriateÂ strategy.Â â€¦â€¦â€¦..HurricaneÂ orÂ stormÂ couldÂ alsoÂ Â causeÂ worrisomeÂ concernsÂ Â inÂ oneÂ orÂ moreÂ regionsÂ ofÂ JapanÂ mentionedÂ inÂ thisÂ articleÂ beforeâ€.Â ItÂ seemsÂ thatÂ predictiveÂ alertsÂ ofÂ thisÂ writerÂ mayÂ haveÂ beenÂ foundÂ toÂ beÂ meaningful.

They like to walk around with flowing robes and love to be greeted with respect in the market places and have the most important seats in the synagogue and the places of honor at banquets. They devour widows'houses and for a show make lengthy prayers.
THESE MEN WILL BE PUNISHED MOST SEVERELY.

COME OUT OF HER!!!
So you will not share with her sins and you will not receive any of her plagues, because her sins are piled up to Heaven and God has remembered her crimes.

on Matthew 23 NIV

on Romans 2 NIV
The Good Shepherd and His Sheep
on John 10 NIV

but GO INTO YOUR ROOM, close the door and pray to your Father who is UNSEEN, and then your Father who sees what is DONE IN SECRET will reward you.
GOD IS SPIRIT, so his worshipers must worship in the Spirit and in Truth;
THEY ARE THE KIND OF WORSHIPERS THE FATHER SEEKS.

These are the teachings,
The Righteousness of our Lord Jesus Christ our God.

May the Spirit of our Lord Jesus Christ our God be with all.
